name: Brian's Web Design
description: As a freelance web designer and website developer in Temecula, California, I specialize in modern web design for small businesses, and have a broad range of skills and experience that includes custom theme creation, PHP programming, e-commerce websites, web design for accessibility, and image editing for the web. Whether you need a simple brochure type website to tell the world who you are, or a website to sell your products, I can create a website to suit your business' needs.
